div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1432 Asia Minor, southern, 1964 Burial: c. 150 B.C. Contents: 22 AR Alexander III: 6 late post. tetradr. (Cyme 1, Myrina 1, Temnus 1, Chios 1, Ala- banda 2) Macedonia, 1st Region: 2 tetradr. Lysimachus: 3 post. tetradr. (Byzantium 2, Calchedon 1) Athens: 1 New Style tetradr. (as Thompson 51) Prusias II: 3 tetradr. Cyme: 2 tetradr. Myrina: 2 tetradr. Smyrna: 1 tetradr. Side: 2 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Boehringer, Zur Chronologie, pp. 180-2, illus.
